overview: The people who star in the documentary have a strong bond with the towns where they have decided to live freely their sexual orientation or gender identity. Their visibility makes them close references for LGTB+ children and young people, as well as for the rest of their neighbors in the municipalities of Huelva where they live. As Alex's mother says: "We eat our heads with all the bad things that can happen and, sometimes, things turn out well".
title: Orgullo rural
